GS41aryabh_u:1: AB 1.1a/ @praṇipatya %ekam anekam kam satyām devatām param brahma/
GS41aryabh_u:3: AB_1.2a/ varga-akṣarāṇi varge avarge avarga-akṣarāṇi kāt $ṅmau $yas/
GS41aryabh_u:4: AB_1.2c/ #kha-%dvi-%navake svarās %nava varge avarge %nava antya-varge vā//
GS41aryabh_u:7: AB_1.4a/ candra-ucca $rjuṣkhidha budha $suguśithṛna bhṛgu $jaṣabikhuchṛ śeṣa arkās/
GS41aryabh_u:8: AB_1.4c/ $buphinaca pāta-vilomās budha-ahni aja-arka-udayāt ca laṅkāyām//
GS41aryabh_u:9: AB_1.5a/ ka-ahas manavas $ḍha manu-yugās $śkha gatās te ca manu-yugās $chnā ca/
GS41aryabh_u:10: AB_1.5c/ kalpa-ādes yuga-#pādās $ga ca guru-divasāt ca bhāratāt pūrvam//
GS41aryabh_u:12: AB_1.6c/ prāṇena @eti kalām bham kha-yuga-aṃśe graha-javas bha-$va-aṃśe arkas//
GS41aryabh_u:13: AB_1.7a/ nṛ-$ṣi yojanam $ñilā bhū-vyāsas arka-indvor $ghriñā $giṇa $ka meros/
GS41aryabh_u:18: AB_1.9c/ savitur amīṣām ca tathā $dvā-$ñakhi-$sā-$hdā-$hlya-$khicya manda-uccam//
GS41aryabh_u:29: AB_2.1c/ āryabhaṭas tu iha @nigadati kusuma-pure abhyarcitam jñānam//
GS41aryabh_u:32: AB_2.3a/ vargas sama-%catur-aśras phalam ca sadṛśa-%dvayasya saṃvargas/
GS41aryabh_u:35: AB_2.4c/ vargāt varge śuddhe labdham sthāna-antare mūlam//
GS41aryabh_u:37: AB_2.5c/ vargas %tri-pūrva-guṇitas śodhyas %prathamāt ghanas ca ghanāt//
GS41aryabh_u:44: AB_2.9a/ sarveṣām kṣetrāṇām @prasādhya pārśve phalam tad-abhyāsas/
GS41aryabh_u:49: AB_2.11c/ sama-cāpa-jyā-%ardhāni tu viṣkambha-%ardhe yathā iṣṭāni//
GS41aryabh_u:51: AB_2.12c/ tad-%prathama-jyā-%ardha-aṃśais tais tais ūnāni śeṣāṇi//
GS41aryabh_u:52: AB_2.13a/ vṛttam bhrameṇa sādhyam ca %catur-bhujam ca karṇābhyām/
GS41aryabh_u:53: AB_2.13c/ sādhyā jalena sama-bhūs adhas-ūrdhvam lambakena eva//
GS41aryabh_u:55: AB_2.14c/ yat tasya varga-mūlam viṣkambha-%ardham sva-vṛttasya//
GS41aryabh_u:57: AB_2.15c/ yat labdham sā chāyā jñeyā śaṅkos sva-mūlāt hi//
GS41aryabh_u:58: AB_2.16a/ chāyā-guṇitam chāyā-agra-vivaram ūnena bhājitam koṭī/
GS41aryabh_u:59: AB_2.16c/ śaṅku-guṇā koṭī sā chāyā-bhaktā bhujā @bhavati//
GS41aryabh_u:60: AB_2.17a/ yas ca eva bhujā-vargas koṭī-vargas ca karṇa-vargas sas/
GS41aryabh_u:61: AB_2.17c/ vṛtte śara-saṃvargas %ardha-jyā-vargas sas khalu dhanuṣos//
GS41aryabh_u:64: AB_2.19a/ iṣṭam vi-%ekam dalitam sa-pūrvam uttara-guṇam sa-mukham madhyam/
GS41aryabh_u:65: AB_2.19c/ iṣṭa-guṇitam iṣṭa-dhanam tu atha vā ādi-antam pada-%ardha-hatam//
GS41aryabh_u:69: AB_2.21c/ %ṣaṣ-bhaktas sas citi-ghanas sa-%eka-pada-ghanas vi-mūlas vā//
GS41aryabh_u:71: AB_2.22c/ varga-citi-ghanas sas @bhavet citi-vargas ghana-citi-ghanas ca//
GS41aryabh_u:72: AB_2.23a/ samparkasya hi vargāt @viśodhayet eva varga-samparkam/
GS41aryabh_u:78: AB_2.26a/ trairāśika-phala-rāśim tam atha icchā-rāśinā hatam @kṛtvā/
GS41aryabh_u:79: AB_2.26c/ labdham pramāṇa-bhajitam tasmāt icchā-phalam idam @syāt//
GS41aryabh_u:81: AB_2.27c/ cheda-guṇam sa-chedam parasparam tat savarṇatvam//
GS41aryabh_u:82: AB_2.28a/ guṇa-kārās bhāga-harās bhāga-harās te @bhavanti guṇa-kārās/
GS41aryabh_u:83: AB_2.28c/ yas kṣepas sas apacayas apacayas kṣepas ca viparīte//
GS41aryabh_u:84: AB_2.29a/ rāśi-ūnam rāśi-ūnam gaccha-dhanam piṇḍitam pṛthaktvena/
GS41aryabh_u:85: AB_2.29c/ vi-%ekena padena hṛtam sarva-dhanam tat @bhavati evam//
GS41aryabh_u:87: AB_2.30c/ labdham gulikā-mūlyam yadi artha-kṛtam @bhavati tulyam//
GS41aryabh_u:96: AB_3.1c/ %ṣaṣṭis nāḍyas divasas %ṣaṣṭis ca vināḍikā nāḍī//
GS41aryabh_u:97: AB_3.2a/ guru-akṣarāṇi %ṣaṣṭis vināḍikā ārkṣī %ṣaṭ eva vā prāṇās/
GS41aryabh_u:98: AB_3.2c/ evam kāla-vibhāgas kṣetra-vibhāgas tathā bha-gaṇāt//
GS41aryabh_u:99: AB_3.3a/ bha-gaṇās %dvayos %dvayos ye viśeṣa-śeṣās yuge %dvi-yogās te/
GS41aryabh_u:102: AB_3.4c/ guru-bha-gaṇās rāśi-guṇās aśvayuja-ādyās guror abdās//
GS41aryabh_u:104: AB_3.5c/ ravi-bhū-yogās divasās bha-āvartās ca api nākṣatrās//
GS41aryabh_u:105: AB_3.6a/ adhimāsakās yuge te ravi-māsebhyas adhikās tu ye cāndrās/
GS41aryabh_u:107: AB_3.7a/ ravi-varṣam mānuṣyam tat api triṃśat-guṇam @bhavati pitryam/
GS41aryabh_u:111: AB_3.9a/ utsarpiṇī yuga-%ardham paścāt apasarpiṇī yuga-%ardham ca/
GS41aryabh_u:112: AB_3.9c/ madhye yugasya suṣamā ādau ante duṣṣamā indu-uccāt//
GS41aryabh_u:113: AB_3.10a/ %ṣaṣṭi-abdānām %ṣaṣṭis yadā vyatītās trayas ca yuga-pādās/
GS41aryabh_u:114: AB_3.10c/ %tri-adhikā %viṃśatis abdās tadā iha mama janmanas atītās//
GS41aryabh_u:115: AB_3.11a/ yuga-varṣa-māsa-divasās samam pravṛttās tu caitra-śukla-ādes/
GS41aryabh_u:116: AB_3.11c/ kālas ayam anādi-antas graha-bhais @anumīyate kṣetre//
GS41aryabh_u:118: AB_3.12c/ divyena nabhas-paridhim samam bhramantas sva-kakṣyāsu//
GS41aryabh_u:119: AB_3.13a/ maṇḍalam alpam adhastāt kālena alpena @pūrayati candras/
GS41aryabh_u:120: AB_3.13c/ upariṣṭāt sarveṣām mahat ca mahatā śanaiścārī//
GS41aryabh_u:121: AB_3.14a/ alpe hi maṇḍale alpā mahati mahāntas ca rāśayas jñeyās/
GS41aryabh_u:122: AB_3.14c/ aṃśās kalās tathā evam vibhāga-tulyās sva-kakṣyāsu//
GS41aryabh_u:124: AB_3.15c/ eṣām adhas ca bhūmis medhī-bhūtā kha-madhya-sthā//
GS41aryabh_u:125: AB_3.16a/ %sapta ete horā-īśās śanaiścara-ādyās yathā-kramam śīghrās/
GS41aryabh_u:128: AB_3.17c/ manda-uccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghra-uccāt//
GS41aryabh_u:129: AB_3.18a/ kakṣyā-maṇḍala-tulyam svam svam pratimaṇḍalam @bhavati eṣām/
GS41aryabh_u:132: AB_3.19c/ vṛtta-paridhau grahās te madhyama-cārāt @bhramanti evam//
GS41aryabh_u:133: AB_3.20a/ yas śīghra-gatis sva-uccāt pratiloma-gatis sva-vṛtta-kakṣyāyām/
GS41aryabh_u:134: AB_3.20c/ anuloma-gatis vṛtte manda-gatis yas grahas @bhavati//
GS41aryabh_u:135: AB_3.21a/ anuloma-gāni mandāt śīghrāt pratiloma-gāni vṛttāni/
GS41aryabh_u:138: AB_3.22c/ śani-guru-kujeṣu mandāt %ardham ṛṇam dhanam @bhavati pūrve//
GS41aryabh_u:139: AB_3.23a/ manda-uccāt śīghra-uccāt %ardham ṛṇam dhanam graheṣu mandeṣu/
GS41aryabh_u:140: AB_3.23c/ manda-uccāt sphuṭa-madhyās śīghra-uccāt ca sphuṭās jñeyās//
GS41aryabh_u:141: AB_3.24a/ śīghra-uccāt %ardha-ūnam kartavyam ṛṇam dhanam sva-manda-ucce/
GS41aryabh_u:142: AB_3.24c/ sphuṭa-madhyau tu bhṛgu-budhau siddhāt mandāt sphuṭau @bhavatas//
GS41aryabh_u:144: AB_3.25c/ kakṣyāyām graha-vegas yas @bhavati sas manda-nīca-ucce//
GS41aryabh_u:146: AB 4.1a/ meṣa-ādes kanyā-antam samam udac-apamaṇḍala-%ardham apayātam/
GS41aryabh_u:147: AB_4.1c/ taulya-ādes mīna-antam śeṣa-%ardham dakṣiṇena eva//
GS41aryabh_u:148: AB_4.2a/ tārā-graha-indu-pātās @bhramanti ajasram apamaṇḍale arkas ca/
GS41aryabh_u:149: AB_4.2c/ arkāt ca maṇḍala-%ardhe @bhramati hi tasmin kṣiti-chāyā//
GS41aryabh_u:150: AB_4.3a/ apamaṇḍalasya candras pātāt @yāti uttareṇa dakṣiṇa-tas/
GS41aryabh_u:151: AB_4.3c/ kuja-guru-koṇās ca evam śīghra-uccena api budha-śukrau//
GS41aryabh_u:152: AB_4.4a/ candras aṃśais %dvādaśabhis avikṣiptas arka-antara-sthitas dṛśyas/
GS41aryabh_u:153: AB_4.4c/ %navabhis bhṛgus bhṛgos tais %dvi-adhikais %dvi-adhikais yathā ślakṣṇās//
GS41aryabh_u:158: AB_4.7a/ yad-vat kadamba-puṣpa-granthis pracitas samantatas kusumais/
GS41aryabh_u:159: AB_4.7c/ tad-vat hi sarva-sattvais jala-jais sthala-jais ca bhū-golas//
GS41aryabh_u:160: AB_4.8a/ brahma-divasena bhūmes upariṣṭāt yojanam @bhavati vṛddhis/
GS41aryabh_u:162: AB_4.9a/ anuloma-gatis nau-sthas @paśyati acalam viloma-gam yad-vat/
GS41aryabh_u:163: AB_4.9c/ acalāni bhāni tad-vat sama-paścima-gāni laṅkāyām//
GS41aryabh_u:164: AB_4.10a/ udaya-astamaya-nimittam nityam pravaheṇa vāyunā kṣiptas/
GS41aryabh_u:166: AB_4.11a/ merus yojana-mātras prabhā-karas hima-vatā parikṣiptas/
GS41aryabh_u:167: AB_4.11c/ nandana-vanasya madhye ratna-mayas sarva-tas vṛttas//
GS41aryabh_u:168: AB_4.12a/ svar-merū sthala-madhye narakas baḍavā-mukham ca jala-madhye/
GS41aryabh_u:170: AB_4.13a/ udayas yas laṅkāyām sas astamayas savitur eva siddha-pure/
GS41aryabh_u:174: AB_4.15a/ bhū-vyāsa-%ardhena ūnam dṛśyam deśāt samāt bha-gola-%ardham/
GS41aryabh_u:178: AB_4.17a/ ravi-varṣa-%ardham devās @paśyanti uditam ravim tathā pretās/
GS41aryabh_u:179: AB_4.17c/ śaśi-māsa-%ardham pitaras śaśi-gās ku-dina-%ardham iha manu-jās//
GS41aryabh_u:180: AB_4.18a/ pūrva-aparam adhas-ūrdhvam maṇḍalam atha dakṣiṇa-uttaram ca eva/
GS41aryabh_u:181: AB_4.18c/ kṣiti-jam sama-pārśva-stham bhānām yatra udaya-astamayau//
GS41aryabh_u:182: AB_4.19a/ pūrva-apara-diś-lagnam kṣiti-jāt akṣa-agrayos ca lagnam yat/
GS41aryabh_u:183: AB_4.19c/ unmaṇḍalam @bhavet tat kṣaya-vṛddhī yatra divasa-niśos//
GS41aryabh_u:184: AB_4.20a/ pūrva-apara-diś-rekhā adhas ca ūrdhvā dakṣiṇa-uttara-sthā ca/
GS41aryabh_u:185: AB_4.20c/ etāsām sampātas draṣṭā yasmin @bhavet deśe//
GS41aryabh_u:186: AB_4.21a/ ūrdhvam adhastāt draṣṭur jñeyam dṛś-maṇḍalam graha-abhimukham/
GS41aryabh_u:188: AB_2.22a/ kāṣṭha-mayam sama-vṛttam samantatas sama-gurum laghum golam/
GS41aryabh_u:189: AB_4.22c/ pārata-taila-jalais tam @bhramayet sva-dhiyā ca kāla-samam//
GS41aryabh_u:191: AB_4.23c/ viṣuvat-jīvā-akṣa-bhujā tasyās tu avalambaks koṭis//
GS41aryabh_u:197: AB_4.26c/ sva-ahorātre kṣiti-jā kṣaya-vṛddhi-jyā dina-niśos sā//
GS41aryabh_u:199: AB_4.27c/ %prathamas antyas ca atha anyau tad-sahitena krama-utkramaśas//
GS41aryabh_u:202: AB_4.29a/ viṣuvat-jīvā-guṇitas sva-iṣṭas śaṅkus sva-lambakena hṛtas/
GS41aryabh_u:205: AB_4.30c/ jyā lambakena labdhā arka-agrā pūrva-apare kṣiti-je//
GS41aryabh_u:206: AB_4.31a/ sā viṣuvat-jyā-ūnā ced viṣuvat-udac-lambakena saṅguṇitā/
GS41aryabh_u:207: AB_4.31c/ viṣuvat-jyayā vibhaktā labdhas pūrva-apare śaṅkus//
GS41aryabh_u:208: AB_4.32a/ kṣiti-jāt unnata-bhāgānām yā jyā sā paras @bhavet śaṅkus/
GS41aryabh_u:209: AB_4.32c/ madhyāt nata-bhāga-jyā chāyā śaṅkos tu tasya eva//
GS41aryabh_u:213: AB_4.34c/ kṣiti-je svā dṛś-chāyā bhū-vyāsa-%ardham nabhas-madhyāt//
GS41aryabh_u:215: AB_4.35c/ udaye dhanam astamaye dakṣiṇa-ge dhanam ṛṇam candre//
GS41aryabh_u:217: AB_4.36c/ udac-ṛṇa-dhanam udac-ayane dakṣiṇa-ge dhanam ṛṇam yāmye//
GS41aryabh_u:218: AB_4.37a/ candras jalam arkas agnis mṛd-bhū-chāyā api yā tamas tat hi/
GS41aryabh_u:219: AB_4.37c/ @chādayati śaśī sūryam śaśinam mahatī ca bhū-chāyā//
GS41aryabh_u:220: AB_4.38a/ sphuṭa-śaśi-māsa-ante arkam pāta-āsannas yadā @praviśati indus/
GS41aryabh_u:221: AB_4.38c/ bhū-chāyām pakṣa-ante tadā adhika-ūnam grahaṇa-madhyam//
GS41aryabh_u:227: AB_4.41c/ sthiti-%ardham asya mūlam jñeyam candra-arka-dina-bhogāt//
GS41aryabh_u:231: AB_4.43c/ vikṣepāt yat śeṣam na @gṛhyate tat śaśāṅkasya//
GS41aryabh_u:233: AB_4.44c/ samparka-%ardhāt śodhyam śeṣas tātkālikas grāsas//
GS41aryabh_u:236: AB_4.46a/ pragrahaṇa-ante dhūmras khaṇḍa-grahaṇe śaśī @bhavati kṛṣṇas/
GS41aryabh_u:239: AB_4.47c/ bhānos bhāsvara-bhāvāt su-accha-tanutvāt ca śaśi-paridhes//
GS41aryabh_u:240: AB_4.48a/ kṣiti-ravi-yogāt dina-kṛt ravi-indu-yogāt @prasādhayet ca indum/
GS41aryabh_u:241: AB_4.48c/ śaśi-tārā-graha-yogāt tathā eva tārā-grahās sarve//
GS41aryabh_u:244: AB_4.50a/ āryabhaṭīyam nāmnā pūrvam svāyambhuavam sadā nityam/
GS41aryabh_u:245: AB_4.50c/ su-kṛta-āyuṣos praṇāśam @kurute pratikañcukam yas asya//
